revised_title: Functions of Positive and Negative Type and Their Connection to Integral Equations
tldr: The author explores the properties of functions of positive and negative type and their connection to integral equations. They classify continuous symmetric functions into three categories: ambiguous type, positive type, and negative type. The author also demonstrates that functions of positive or negative type can be expanded as a series of products of normal functions, and that this series converges both absolutely and uniformly.
